# Security scan exclusions
# Files and patterns that contain legitimate "sk-" patterns that should be excluded from security scans
# One pattern per line, supports grep --exclude-from syntax (base names only)

# Production log management script (contains --disk-usage parameter)
prod-logs-status

# Claude Code settings (may contain command examples with patterns)
settings.local.json
